Class Quiz

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.main.java.net.javaguides.springboot.model.Quiz

  • public class Quiz
extends java.lang.Object
    Quiz Class is a class that holds questions and assesses students.

      • Quiz

        public Quiz(java.lang.String f,
            java.lang.String l,
            QuestionBank b,
            int n)
        Constructor for objects of class Quiz. Build a random n-question quiz using a provided question bank.
        Parameters:
        f - the first name of the student
        l - the last name of the student
        b - the question bank to pull questions from
        n - the number of questions needed
